formattedAddress: 2430 FDR Dr, New York, NY 10010, USA
adrFormatAddress: 2430 FDR Dr, New York, NY 10010-4046, USA

originalText.text: Boat ride was excellent. But the line was rather confusing. The staff tried their best to keep all patrons informed but they were overwhelmed handling 3 parties for one boat ride.

text.text: Boat ride was excellent. But the line was rather confusing. The staff tried their best to keep all patrons informed but they were overwhelmed handling 3 parties for one boat ride.

originalText.text: Very bad experience. Wasted an entire day to wait around. Felt dangerously overcrowded and nowhere to sit for my aging parents. I do not recommend the Jewel at all. Our hopes at seeing the Statue of Liberty will never be a good memory. That said, New York was an excellent experience. Just too bad this single, overpriced cruise was so unpleasant.

text.text: Very bad experience. Wasted an entire day to wait around. Felt dangerously overcrowded and nowhere to sit for my aging parents. I do not recommend the Jewel at all. Our hopes at seeing the Statue of Liberty will never be a good memory. That said, New York was an excellent experience. Just too bad this single, overpriced cruise was so unpleasant.

originalText.text: We went on the Avalon Yacht hosted by Oasis Party Events. We had an awesome time, like it was just amazing. The drinks were great, the views were spectacular, even security was wonderful. The Yacht itself was beautiful, 2 floors and an outside deck. The music was awesome too, Dj HotRod played all the latest songs from hip hop to reggae and all kinds of Spanish music. It was just an all around great night, organized, fun. I would highly recommend.

text.text: We went on the Avalon Yacht hosted by Oasis Party Events. We had an awesome time, like it was just amazing. The drinks were great, the views were spectacular, even security was wonderful. The Yacht itself was beautiful, 2 floors and an outside deck. The music was awesome too, Dj HotRod played all the latest songs from hip hop to reggae and all kinds of Spanish music. It was just an all around great night, organized, fun. I would highly recommend.

originalText.text: Attended their Latin Cruise 6pm-10pm or so. The tickets were about $20 per person but they did not check them the day of. We all waited in line for about an hour then we were taken onto the yacht. There were trays of pasta, rice, chicken parm, I think pork and wings. A packing plate of food was $20 per person. The drinks were also about the same price and waster was about $5 per person. The yacht cruise was wobbly at certain points and everyone enjoyed their dancing despite it and had a great time. The music was great and the views were breathtaking.

text.text: Attended their Latin Cruise 6pm-10pm or so. The tickets were about $20 per person but they did not check them the day of. The drinks were also about the same price and waster was about $5 per person. The yacht cruise was wobbly at certain points and everyone enjoyed their dancing despite it and had a great time. The music was great and the views were breathtaking.

originalText.text: I am on the Avalon Yacht as I’m writing this (social battery recharging) for the 2024 NYE party which was $115 when I bought it back in October. What tempted me to write this review is >$115 is a LOT OF money for most people, so be aware this ship is pretty overcrowded with the minimal tables. The music is great with American & latin pop + r&b, and the staff are great too! You only get ONE buffet ticket & the portions they give personally didn’t fill me up in the styrofoam container given. You get free drinks so that’s good. I recommend looking at other reviews on here if you plan on buying tickets for an NYE cruise party or something else!!! Pic inserted is the inside of the Avalon x
